医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
咖啡因的抗炎作用可能有助于保护血管牛津大学出版社在《风湿病学》上发表的一篇新论文发现，摄入更多咖啡因可以改善心脏健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Caffeines-anti-炎症-effects-may-help-protect-blood-vessels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Caffeines-anti-炎症-effects-may-help-protect-blood-vessels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b50878bd-6975-408b-a777-b49874162a84 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 01:13:44 -0400 Caffeine's anti-inflammatory effects may help protect blood vessels
与 PIPETBOY GENIUS 测试您的移液器控制器，并有机会获胜！ INTEGRA Biosciences 邀请血清移液器用户在最新的抽奖活动中接受移液挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Test-your-pipet-controller-against-the-PIPETBOY-GENIUS-and-stand-a-chance-to-win!.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Test-your-pipet-controller-against-the-PIPETBOY-GENIUS-and-stand-a-chance-to-win!.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=428fde40-d825-4ffb-9110-61b0a064da58 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:58:00 -0400 Test your pipet controller against the PIPETBOY GENIUS and stand a chance to win!
肝癌患者通过精准医疗工具清楚地了解手术选择杜克大学-新加坡国立大学校友 Marjorie Hoang 博士（2023 届）和她的导师 Pierce Chow 教授通过创建一种可以准确计算的算法，让诊断为中期肝癌的患者及其医生所面临的复杂决策过程变得清晰。手术后可能的总生存期和无复发生存期。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Liver-cancer-病人-gain-clarity-on-surgery-options-through- precision-medicine-tool.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Liver-cancer-病人-gain-clarity-on-surgery-options-through- precision-medicine-tool.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c7390564-e7aa-4114-b153-1cfbb2618137 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:36:04 -0400 Liver cancer patients gain clarity on surgery options through precision medicine tool
新研究将大脑活动与日常行为和长期心理健康联系起来在一项罕见的纵向研究中，阿尔托大学和奥卢大学的研究人员利用脑部扫描以及可穿戴设备和智能手机的数据跟踪一个人的大脑和行为活动长达五个月。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/New-study-links-brain-activity-with-daily-behavior-and-long-term-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/New-study-links-brain-activity-with-daily-behavior-and-long-term-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=831ea9b6-67b1-474e-aff0-42ad5626683b Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:24:06 -0400 New study links brain activity with daily behavior and long-term mental health
COVID-19 显着增加中风风险研究人员对 34 项系统评价和 70 项研究进行了元伞审查，发现了 COVID-19 严重程度与中风风险增加之间的显着联系。该审查强调需要进一步调查潜在机制和潜在偏见。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/COVID-19-significantly-raises-中风-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/COVID-19-significantly-raises-中风-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9e90e5db-640f-4f02-811b-458cee8f63d7 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:20:00 -0400 COVID-19 significantly raises stroke risk
人工智能改善医疗服务的潜力可能会被利用所抵消随着人工智能驱动的工具越来越多地进入医疗保健领域，加州大学圣克鲁斯分校政治系博士生露西娅·维塔莱的最新研究评估了当前的前景和焦虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/AIs-pottial-to-improve-healthcare-access-could-be-offset-by-exploitation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/AIs-pottial-to-improve-healthcare-access-could-be-offset-by-exploitation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f1915c8-e0dc-40bf-ab20-547e8a5d1805 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:16:54 -0400 AI's potential to improve healthcare access could be offset by exploitation
研究酵母可以解锁使癌细胞更脆弱的新方法应激酵母可以告诉我们什么有关细胞基本过程的知识？据欧洲分子生物学实验室 (EMBL) 的科学家称，很多。该团队研究的课题包括细胞如何适应压力，例如营养缺乏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Studying-yeast-could-unlock-new-ways-to-make-cancer-cells-more-vulnerable.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Studying-yeast-could-unlock-new-ways-to-make-cancer-cells-more-vulnerable.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8f48ebbe-c0bb-42a4-9828-ceeefa1eea4e Wed, 09 Oct 2024 00:06:37 -0400 Studying yeast could unlock new ways to make cancer cells more vulnerable
技术进步揭示细胞功能细胞是生命的基本单位——但是当谈到细胞时，如果你认为基本意味着简单，那就再想一想了。细胞很复杂，每秒有数百万次生化反应在其范围内沸腾。它们也往往很小，因此不容易监视它们的操作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Advances-in-technology-shed-light-on-cell-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Advances-in-technology-shed-light-on-cell-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b977b7f-554d-4a48-a315-fd0cdd9ff140 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 23:55:40 -0400 Advances in technology shed light on cell function
血糖水平升高会增加早发结直肠癌的风险研究发现，血糖水平升高会显着增加结直肠癌的风险，其中早发病例的关联性更强。没有检测到非线性关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Elevated-blood-glucose-levels-increase-early-onset-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Elevated-blood-glucose-levels-increase-early-onset-colorectal-cancer-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fa0a97e4-ddef-4dff-807d-649092bd2f69 Tue, 08 Oct 2024 23:49:00 -0400 Elevated blood glucose levels increase early-onset colorectal cancer risk
新型化合物有望对抗 COVID-19威斯塔研究所萨尔维诺实验室的新研究——；由约瑟夫·萨尔维诺教授博士领导-;已经确定了一系列新型 SARS-CoV-2 Mpro 抑制剂，可能会导致潜在的新的 COVID-19 治疗方法，根据临床前测试，这些抑制剂可有效抑制 COVID-19 并与现有的抗 COVID 疗法产生协同作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Novel-compounds-show-promise-in-fighting-COVID-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241008/Novel-compounds-show-promise-in-fighting-COVID-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1f773f18-83c8-4aa1-8ec3-19198ef5371f Tue, 08 Oct 2024 23:44:40 -0400 Novel compounds show promise in fighting COVID-19
